title: Look & Lease 4 Weeks Rent Free! Open 1 Bed 1 Bath Move In Ready Now! -
posting_body: Lease same day and get up to FOUR WEEKS FREE RENT!
Vintage Inspired Apartment Living, Opening Summer 2022

Find comfort all around at Fireside Flats, where high-end living spaces welcome you home – from the three-sided fireplace in the lobby to the walls of your brand new apartment home, all the way up to the top-floor speakeasy and roof deck.
Select from a collection of studio, one- and two-bedroom floor plans, with your choice of light or dark finish palettes to complement your décor.
Elevate your experience with a covered, private balcony, floor-to-ceiling windows or air conditioning, available in select homes.
Located in the heart of Seattle’s vibrant Roosevelt neighborhood, you’ll be in good company.
Favorite local restaurants, eclectic shops and everyday conveniences line the surrounding streets, with the shores of Green Lake just a short walk away.
When you need to venture further out, access to I-5 is just a few blocks up, with the Roosevelt Light Rail station a few blocks down.
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 436 Sq.
- Covered, private terrace, patio or Juliet balcony*
- Kitchen island with breakfast bar seating area *
- Roller shades pre-installed on all windows
- Luxury wood-style vinyl plank flooring throughout
- Pantry cabinets and hanging storage cabinets/closets*
- Rooftop deck with telescope, cozy seating and dining area
- Free Wi-Fi available in common areas
- Lobby hospitality counter with coffee maker
- Underground, controlled access garage parking available
- Dog wash station and community-wide pet-friendly policies
- 6th-floor speakeasy lounge with bar, TV, co-working island
- Additional storage space available on garage level
- Views of Seattle skyline, Green Lake, Olympic Mountains
- Three-sided fireplace with gathering space in lobby
Photos and/or floor plans shown are representational and may not depict the exact layout or features of the available unit.
If currently occupied, the individual unit you've selected may not be available to tour.
Please contact our leasing team with any questions.
